amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a system for labeling violent content in audio and visual media products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 35 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to establish a system for labeling violent content in audio and visual media products, ban the commercial distribution of unlabeled products after one year, and subject violators to a fine of $10,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 266 (Roll no. 224).
